headline: In New Senator’s First Month, A Trial and ‘Total Immersion’
abstract: The Georgia Republican was sworn in as the Senate’s newest member just in time to sit for the impeachment trial against President Trump.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — As her colleagues fretted privately on Monday over revelations from John R. Bolton, the former national security adviser whose forthcoming book pokes holes in President Trump’s impeachment defense, the newest Republican member of the United States Senate rushed to publicly side with Mr. Trump.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
